entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle or freezing drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle and ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
